title: Stewie2K leaving competitive CS
description: The Major winner will instead focus on streaming.

title: HAVU announce revamped roster
description: The Finnish organization has completed its lineup, which includes the return of two former players.

title: EG to sign neaLaN and misutaaa - Report
description: After months of inactivity, the main Evil Geniuses squad looks to add two players from overseas.

title: Who were the winners and losers of the last off-season?
description: With another player break upon us, it is time to evaluate the teams that made changes coming in to 2022.

title: jks to join G2 - Report
description: The Australian will join G2 after a lengthy period of inactivity, taking the place of Audric "JACKZ" Jug.

title: Video: Players offer thoughts on M4A1-S nerf
description: The silenced variant of the CT rifle has been the go-to choice for almost a year, but has the recent change to its magazine size done enough to curb its use?

title: paiN receive ESL Challenger Melbourne invite
description: The Brazilian squad rounds out the event team list.

title: GODSENT release academy roster *
description: The Young Gods are but mere mortals once more.

title: First Champion of Champions Tour qualifiers announced
description: The dates for the South American, Central European, and North American open qualifiers have been revealed.

title: peacemaker set to depart Imperial - Report
description: Another roster change looks to be on the horizon for the veteran squad.
